meta_title: Agnes Millie | Full Stack Software Architect
meta_description: Portfolio of Agnes Millie, Full Stack Software Architect.
hero_words: Full Stack Software Architect.,Software Engineer.,Cloud & DevOps Specialist.,Scalable Solutions.
hero_description: Building the future of technology with robust and innovative code.
about_p1: As a Software Architect, my passion is transforming complex concepts into functional and scalable solutions. My experience spans the entire development lifecycleâ€”from conception and architecture to implementation and optimization.
about_p2: My specialty is designing and implementing resilient software architectures, focusing on event-driven systems and microservice orchestration. I have experience in optimizing performance bottlenecks in high-concurrency applications, ensuring scalability and robust uptime. My philosophy focuses on clean code and rigorous CI/CD automation.
about_p3: I am an active open-source contributor, focusing on observability tools and infrastructure security (DevSecOps).
philosophy_card1_desc: Security is not a feature, but the foundation. I integrate DevSecOps and Zero Trust architecture practices from the very first commit.
philosophy_card2_desc: I build software that reflects business complexity, creating cohesive microservices with clear boundaries (bounded contexts).
philosophy_card3_desc: Obsessed with performance. I design event-driven, asynchronous systems that handle high concurrency without degradation.
philosophy_card4_desc: A system that cannot be tested or observed is a broken system. I implement the Test Pyramid and the pillar of logs, metrics, and traces.
journey_item1_desc: Technical leadership in designing and implementing large-scale distributed systems, focusing on cloud architecture and microservices.
journey_item2_desc: Focused on Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Kubernetes) and automating complex CI/CD pipelines for multi-regional environments.
journey_item3_desc: Developed and optimized high-performance RESTful APIs (Java/Python) and mentored junior/mid-level developers.

contact_desc: I am available for collaborations, software architecture consulting, and new challenges.
